text: Certain organizations have applications
that make millions of requests to subsets of data,
and they need the lowest latency possible
to accelerate application runtimes and improve performance.
The Amazon S3 Express One Zone storage class
is purpose built to deliver the lowest latency
and highest performance cloud object storage.
With consistent single digit millisecond latency,
you can improve access times and accelerate data processing.
With S3 Express One Zone,
you store data in S3 directory buckets
within an availability zone that you specify, enabling you
to co-locate storage
and compute resources to reduce latency.
S3 Express One Zone optimizes the speed
and cost of data access, especially for workloads
with many small objects
and scales to process hundreds of thousands
of requests per second for frequently accessed data sets.
From here, you can accelerate your analytics,
machine learning and other high performance workloads
while reducing overall TCO with lower request costs
and more efficient use of compute resources.
You no longer need to manage multiple storage systems
for low latency workloads
and your applications access data
through the same Amazon S3 APIs that you already use.
Get started
with the S3 Express One Zone storage class today.
